title: FUCK YOU RITO
body:
Are you realy that fucking dumb that you put me in bronze 2 after I was Silver 1 last season and now after a 5/5 placement series you put me with here?!
What the actuall fuck are you trying to do? Because it's not fair to do that after I have played 3 fucking games with afks and 5 fucking games with people who give up after someone in my team gives away first blood. I really can't understand WTF I have been doing wrong to make me a SILVER/BRONZE PLAYER. This is fucking ridicoulus.

replies.body: Got all year pal no rush for me. Got better things to be doing. ;^)
Yeah same. But I have acually tried unlesss some wanker in a basement

"unlesss some wanker in a basement" First of all, it's Unlike* some wanker in a basement, secondly, we are in Australia/New Zealand, how often do you see anyone have a basement here, thirdly whats wrong with wanking? Are you just jealous you have too small of a dick to pleasure yourself? Or are you jealous that he doesn't have to cry in the Conor while wanking unlike you do?
